description:
Welcome to Brooklyn!

Live in our sunny, comfortable home during your stay.  Enjoy our 1 bed / 1 bath with full access to the kitchen and stylish living room. For groups, the sofa pulls out into a queen size bed.

The express trains (2 3 4 5 lines) are steps from our front door will get you into Manhattan in 20 minutes.

Our neighborhood has an amazing selection of cafes, restaurants and bars and is 2 blocks from Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza.
name: Sunny Home near Prospect Park
review: Patrick's place is within walking distance of restaurants and nearby bars. Very easy to find apartment building. Inside of the apartment is super nice and comfortable.
